title: Glassmorphic Button
desc: Glassmorphic Button with animated Gradient Border. This example demonstrates how to combine backdrop blur, transparencies, animated custom properties and gradient borders.

title: Animated CSS CD-ROM
desc: Born in 2022, it has become one of the most popular PokéDex trackers and box organizers in the Pokémon community, with more than 50K active users.

title: Animated Retro Futuristic Grid
desc: A retro-futuristic grid with an infinite scrolling effect, using gradients.
